header.title: start

comref.comsummary: OTP start script example for Unix.

description.p: The start script is an example script on how to start up the Erlang system in embedded mode on Unix.

For more information about the use, see the
Embedded System User's Guide in System Documentation.

func.name: start [ data_file ]
func.fsummary: Example script on how to start up the Erlang system in embedded mode on Unix.

item.p: Optional. Specifies what start_erl.data file to use.

desc.p: Environment variable RELDIR can be set before calling this example, which sets the directory where to find the release files.
